verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> prophesy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against רוֹעֵ֣י <S%H7462><s%> against the shepherds יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֩ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֨ם <S%H413><s%> to לָרֹעִ֜ים <S%H7462><s%> unto the shepherds כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD ה֤וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe רֹעֵֽי־ <S%H7462><s%> [be] to the shepherds יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> have been רֹעִ֣ים <S%H7462><s%> that do feed אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> cattle יִרְע֖וּ <S%H7462><s%> themselves should not the shepherds הָרֹעִֽים׃ <S%H7462><s%> feed

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֵ֤לֶב <S%H2459><s%> the fat תֹּאכֵ֙לוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> Ye eat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֶּ֣מֶר <S%H6785><s%> you with the wool תִּלְבָּ֔שׁוּ <S%H3847><s%> and ye clothe הַבְּרִיאָ֖ה <S%H1277><s%> them that are fed תִּזְבָּ֑חוּ <S%H2076><s%> ye kill הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> not the flock לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without תִרְעֽוּ׃ <S%H7462><s%> [but] ye feed

אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנַּחְלוֹת֩ <S%H2470><s%> The diseased לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> nor חִזַּקְתֶּ֜ם <S%H2388><s%> have ye not strengthened וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחוֹלָ֣ה <S%H2470><s%> that which was sick לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor רִפֵּאתֶ֗ם <S%H7495><s%> neither have ye healed וְלַנִּשְׁבֶּ֙רֶת֙ <S%H7665><s%> [that which was] broken לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor חֲבַשְׁתֶּ֔ם <S%H2280><s%> neither have ye bound up וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנִּדַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H5080><s%> that which was driven away לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor הֲשֵׁבֹתֶ֔ם <S%H7725><s%> neither have ye brought again וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֹבֶ֖דֶת <S%H6><s%> that which was lost לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor בִקַּשְׁתֶּ֑ם <S%H1245><s%> neither have ye sought וּבְחָזְקָ֛ה <S%H2394><s%> but with force רְדִיתֶ֥ם <S%H7287><s%> have ye ruled אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> וּבְפָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H6531><s%> and with cruelty

וַתְּפוּצֶ֖ינָה <S%H6327><s%> And they were scattered מִבְּלִ֣י <S%H1097><s%> lack רֹעֶ֑ה <S%H7462><s%> because [there is] no shepherd וַתִּהְיֶ֧ינָה <S%H1961><s%> became לְאָכְלָ֛ה <S%H402><s%> and they became meat לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> to all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field וַתְּפוּצֶֽינָה׃ <S%H6327><s%> when they were scattered

יִשְׁגּ֤וּ <S%H7686><s%> wandered צֹאנִי֙ <S%H6629><s%> My sheep בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֶ֣הָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> through all the mountains וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every גִּבְעָ֣ה <S%H1389><s%> hill רָמָ֑ה <S%H7311><s%> and upon every high וְעַ֨ל <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> upon all the face הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the earth נָפֹ֣צוּ <S%H6327><s%> was scattered צֹאנִ֔י <S%H6629><s%> yea my flock וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there דּוֹרֵ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> and none did search וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> was no מְבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H1245><s%> or seek
לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore רֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> Therefore ye shepherds שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> [As] I live אָ֜נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻ֣ם ׀ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> because הֱיֽוֹת־ <S%H1961><s%> has become צֹאנִ֣י ׀ <S%H6629><s%> surely because my flock לָבַ֡ז <S%H957><s%> became a prey וַתִּֽהְיֶינָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become צֹאנִ֨י <S%H6629><s%> and my flock לְאָכְלָ֜ה <S%H402><s%> became meat לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all חַיַּ֤ת <S%H2416><s%> to every beast הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> of the field מֵאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> lack רֹעֶ֔ה <S%H7462><s%> because [there was] no shepherd וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not דָרְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1875><s%> search רֹעַ֖י <S%H7462><s%> neither did my shepherds אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹאנִ֑י <S%H6629><s%> for my flock וַיִּרְע֤וּ <S%H7462><s%> but the shepherds הָֽרֹעִים֙ <S%H7462><s%> fed אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹאנִ֖י <S%H6629><s%> not my flock לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not רָעֽוּ׃ <S%H7462><s%> themselves and fed ס
לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> therefore הָֽרֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> Therefore O ye shepherds שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> I am against הָרֹעִ֜ים <S%H7462><s%> Behold I [am] against the shepherds וְֽדָרַשְׁתִּ֧י <S%H1875><s%> and I will require אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹאנִ֣י <S%H6629><s%> my flock מִיָּדָ֗ם <S%H3027><s%> at their hand וְהִשְׁבַּתִּים֙ <S%H7673><s%> and cause them to cease מֵרְע֣וֹת <S%H7462><s%> from feeding צֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> the flock וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִרְע֥וּ <S%H7462><s%> neither shall the shepherds ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore הָרֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> feed אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְהִצַּלְתִּ֤י <S%H5337><s%> themselves any more for I will deliver צֹאנִי֙ <S%H6629><s%> my flock מִפִּיהֶ֔ם <S%H6310><s%> from their mouth וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִהְיֶ֥יןָ <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֖ם לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> that they may not be meat ס

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִי־ <S%H2005><s%> behold אָ֕נִי <S%H589><s%> Myself וְדָרַשְׁתִּ֥י <S%H1875><s%> Behold I [even] I will both search אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹאנִ֖י <S%H6629><s%> my sheep וּבִקַּרְתִּֽים׃ <S%H1239><s%> and seek them out

כְּבַקָּרַת֩ <S%H1243><s%> seeketh out רֹעֶ֨ה <S%H7462><s%> As a shepherd עֶדְר֜וֹ <S%H5739><s%> his flock בְּיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> in the day הֱיוֹת֤וֹ <S%H1961><s%> become בְתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> that he is among צֹאנוֹ֙ <S%H6629><s%> his sheep נִפְרָשׁ֔וֹת <S%H6567><s%> [that are] scattered כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so אֲבַקֵּ֣ר <S%H1239><s%> so will I seek out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹאנִ֑י <S%H6629><s%> my sheep וְהִצַּלְתִּ֣י <S%H5337><s%> and will deliver אֶתְהֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּקוֹמֹת֙ <S%H4725><s%> them out of all places אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to which נָפֹ֣צוּ <S%H6327><s%> where they have been scattered שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> in it בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day עָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> in the cloudy וַעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <S%H6205><s%> and dark

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֣ים <S%H3318><s%> And I will bring them out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָעַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> from the people וְקִבַּצְתִּים֙ <S%H6908><s%> and gather מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> them from the countries וַהֲבִיאֹתִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> and will bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַדְמָתָ֑ם <S%H127><s%> them to their own land וּרְעִיתִים֙ <S%H7462><s%> and feed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> them upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בָּאֲפִיקִ֕ים <S%H650><s%> by the rivers וּבְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מוֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H4186><s%> and in all the inhabited places הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the country

בְּמִרְעֶה־ <S%H4829><s%> pasture טּוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> them in a good אֶרְעֶ֣ה <S%H7462><s%> I will feed אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וּבְהָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> mountains מְרֽוֹם־ <S%H4791><s%> and upon the high יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become נְוֵהֶ֑ם <S%H5116><s%> shall their fold שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> There תִּרְבַּ֙צְנָה֙ <S%H7257><s%> be there shall they lie בְּנָ֣וֶה <S%H5116><s%> fold טּ֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> in a good וּמִרְעֶ֥ה <S%H4829><s%> pasture שָׁמֵ֛ן <S%H8082><s%> and [in] a fat תִּרְעֶ֖ינָה <S%H7462><s%> shall they feed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I אֶרְעֶ֤ה <S%H7462><s%> I will feed צֹאנִי֙ <S%H6629><s%> my flock וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> and I אַרְבִּיצֵ֔ם <S%H7257><s%> and I will cause them to lie down נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֹבֶ֤דֶת <S%H6><s%> that which was lost אֲבַקֵּשׁ֙ <S%H1245><s%> I will seek וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנִּדַּ֣חַת <S%H5080><s%> that which was driven away אָשִׁ֔יב <S%H7725><s%> and bring again וְלַנִּשְׁבֶּ֣רֶת <S%H7665><s%> [that which was] broken אֶחֱבֹ֔שׁ <S%H2280><s%> and will bind up וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחוֹלָ֖ה <S%H2470><s%> that which was sick אֲחַזֵּ֑ק <S%H2388><s%> and will strengthen וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁמֵנָ֧ה <S%H8082><s%> the fat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲזָקָ֛ה <S%H2389><s%> and the strong אַשְׁמִ֖יד <S%H8045><s%> but I will destroy אֶרְעֶ֥נָּה <S%H7462><s%> I will feed בְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> them with judgment

וְאַתֵּ֣נָה <S%H859><s%> And [as for] you צֹאנִ֔י <S%H6629><s%> O my flock כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold שֹׁפֵט֙ <S%H8199><s%> Behold I judge בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between שֶׂ֣ה <S%H7716><s%> between cattle לָשֶׂ֔ה <S%H7716><s%> and cattle לָאֵילִ֖ים <S%H352><s%> between the rams וְלָעַתּוּדִֽים׃ <S%H6260><s%> and the he goats

הַמְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> [Seemeth it] a small thing מִכֶּ֗ם <S%H4480><s%> too הַמִּרְעֶ֤ה <S%H4829><s%> pasture הַטּוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> the good תִּרְע֔וּ <S%H7462><s%> unto you to have eaten up וְיֶ֙תֶר֙ <S%H3499><s%> the residue מִרְעֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4829><s%> pasture תִּרְמְס֖וּ <S%H7429><s%> but ye must tread down בְּרַגְלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H7272><s%> with your feet וּמִשְׁקַע־ <S%H4950><s%> of the deep מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters תִּשְׁתּ֔וּ <S%H8354><s%> assuredly וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> הַנּ֣וֹתָרִ֔ים <S%H3498><s%> the residue בְּרַגְלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H7272><s%> your feet תִּרְפֹּשֽׂוּן׃ <S%H7515><s%> but ye must foul

וְצֹאנִ֑י <S%H6629><s%> And [as for] my flock מִרְמַ֤ס <S%H4823><s%> that which ye have trodden רַגְלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H7272><s%> with your feet תִּרְעֶ֔ינָה <S%H7462><s%> they eat וּמִרְפַּ֥שׂ <S%H4833><s%> that which ye have fouled רַגְלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H7272><s%> with your feet תִּשְׁתֶּֽינָה׃ <S%H8354><s%> and they drink ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about הִנְנִי־ <S%H2005><s%> behold אָ֕נִי <S%H589><s%> I וְשָֽׁפַטְתִּי֙ <S%H8199><s%> unto them Behold I [even] I will judge בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between שֶׂ֣ה <S%H7716><s%> cattle בִרְיָ֔ה <S%H1277><s%> the fat וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between שֶׂ֖ה <S%H7716><s%> cattle רָזָֽה׃ <S%H7330><s%> and between the lean

יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because בְּצַ֤ד <S%H6654><s%> with side וּבְכָתֵף֙ <S%H3802><s%> and with shoulder תֶּהְדֹּ֔פוּ <S%H1920><s%> Because ye have thrust וּבְקַרְנֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H7161><s%> with your horns תְּנַגְּח֖וּ <S%H5055><s%> and pushed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַנַּחְל֑וֹת <S%H2470><s%> all the diseased עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> you הֲפִיצוֹתֶ֛ם <S%H6327><s%> till ye have scattered אוֹתָ֖נָה <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַחֽוּצָה׃ <S%H2351><s%> them abroad

וְהוֹשַׁעְתִּ֣י <S%H3467><s%> Therefore will I save לְצֹאנִ֔י <S%H6629><s%> my flock וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no תִהְיֶ֥ינָה <S%H1961><s%> become ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer לָבַ֑ז <S%H957><s%> and they shall no more be a prey וְשָׁ֣פַטְתִּ֔י <S%H8199><s%> and I will judge בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between שֶׂ֖ה <S%H7716><s%> between cattle לָשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H7716><s%> and cattle

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֨י <S%H6965><s%> And I will set up עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H5921><s%> over רֹעֶ֤ה <S%H7462><s%> shepherd אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> one וְרָעָ֣ה <S%H7462><s%> over them and he shall feed אֶתְהֶ֔ן <S%H853><s%> אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> עַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> them [even] my servant דָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> David ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself יִרְעֶ֣ה <S%H7462><s%> he shall feed אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> himself יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֖ן לְרֹעֶֽה׃ <S%H7462><s%> them and he shall be their shepherd

וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> and I יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And I the LORD אֶהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶם֙ לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> will be their God וְעַבְדִּ֥י <S%H5650><s%> and my servant דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David נָשִׂ֣יא <S%H5387><s%> a prince בְתוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> among אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> them I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> have spoken

וְכָרַתִּ֤י <S%H3772><s%> And I will make לָהֶם֙ בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> with them a covenant שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> of peace וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֥י <S%H7673><s%> to cease חַיָּֽה־ <S%H2416><s%> beasts רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> and will cause the evil מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land וְיָשְׁב֤וּ <S%H3427><s%> and they shall dwell בַמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness לָבֶ֔טַח <S%H983><s%> safely וְיָשְׁנ֖וּ <S%H3462><s%> and sleep בַּיְּעָרִֽים׃ <S%H3293><s%> the woods

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> And I will make אוֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> וּסְבִיב֥וֹת <S%H5439><s%> them and the places round about גִּבְעָתִ֖י <S%H1389><s%> my hill בְּרָכָ֑ה <S%H1293><s%> a blessing וְהוֹרַדְתִּ֤י <S%H3381><s%> to come down הַגֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <S%H1653><s%> and I will cause the shower בְּעִתּ֔וֹ <S%H6256><s%> in his season גִּשְׁמֵ֥י <S%H1653><s%> there shall be showers בְרָכָ֖ה <S%H1293><s%> of blessing יִֽהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְנָתַן֩ <S%H5414><s%> shall yield עֵ֨ץ <S%H6086><s%> And the tree הַשָּׂדֶ֜ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּרְי֗וֹ <S%H6529><s%> her fruit וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> and the earth תִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> shall yield יְבוּלָ֔הּ <S%H2981><s%> her increase וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַדְמָתָ֖ם <S%H127><s%> in their land לָבֶ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> and they shall be safe וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <S%H3045><s%> and shall know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בְּשִׁבְרִי֙ <S%H7665><s%> when I have broken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹט֣וֹת <S%H4133><s%> the bands עֻלָּ֔ם <S%H5923><s%> of their yoke וְהִ֨צַּלְתִּ֔ים <S%H5337><s%> and delivered מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> them out of the hand הָעֹבְדִ֥ים <S%H5647><s%> of those that served בָּהֶֽם׃

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יִהְי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer בַּז֙ <S%H957><s%> And they shall no more be a prey לַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> to the heathen וְחַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> neither shall the beast הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will no תֹאכְלֵ֑ם <S%H398><s%> devour וְיָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> them but they shall dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> safely וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and no מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <S%H2729><s%> and none shall make [them] afraid

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֥י <S%H6965><s%> And I will raise up לָהֶ֛ם מַטָּ֖ע <S%H4302><s%> for them a plant לְשֵׁ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> of renown וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִהְי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> and they will not ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again אֲסֻפֵ֤י <S%H622><s%> and they shall be no more consumed רָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> with hunger בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and they will not יִשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> neither bear ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore כְּלִמַּ֥ת <S%H3639><s%> the shame הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen
